data_table.description: The subject consent file includes subject IDs, consent information, subject alias, and affection status for sensorineural hearing loss.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Deafness case control status of the subject
